courses.title: Web Development Fully Complete Guideline
courses.instructorDescription: Savannah Nguyen is a passionate full-stack developer with over 10 years of experience. She has taught thousands of students and loves making complex topics easy to understand.
courses.description: This complete web development course takes you from beginner to confident developer. You'll learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and build real projects step by step.
courses.whatLearn: Build modern responsive websites · Master HTML, CSS & JavaScript · Create interactive web apps · Understand basic backend concepts
courses.curriculumDescription: The course is divided into 10 clear sections starting with basics and ending with full projects. Each lesson includes video lectures, code examples, and quizzes.
courses.reviewsDescription: Students love the clear explanations and practical projects. Many have built their first websites and landed freelance jobs after completing this course.

courses.title: Beginner Adobe Illustrator For Graphic Design
courses.instructorDescription: Charles Thompson is a professional graphic designer and Adobe expert. He has worked with big brands and enjoys teaching beginners how to create beautiful designs.
courses.description: Perfect for beginners who want to learn Adobe Illustrator. Create logos, icons, and illustrations from scratch with easy-to-follow lessons.
courses.whatLearn: Master Illustrator tools · Design professional logos · Create vector illustrations · Work with colors and typography
courses.curriculumDescription: 8 structured sections covering everything from basic tools to advanced techniques. Includes practical exercises and project files.
courses.reviewsDescription: Beginners especially love how quickly they can create professional-looking designs. Many students made their first logo within weeks.

courses.title: Starting SEO As Your Home Based Business
courses.instructorDescription: Morgan Freeman has run a successful SEO agency for 15 years. He now teaches others how to start their own profitable SEO business from home.
courses.description: Learn how to start and grow an SEO business from home. Perfect for anyone wanting to make money online with flexible hours.
courses.whatLearn: SEO fundamentals · Keyword research · Get and keep clients · Rank websites on Google
courses.curriculumDescription: 9 practical modules focused on real-world SEO strategies and client management. Includes templates and tools.
courses.reviewsDescription: Many students started earning money within months. They appreciate the honest, no-fluff approach to building an online business.

courses.title: Beginner Adobe Illustrator For Graphic Design
courses.instructorDescription: Savannah Nguyen is a passionate full-stack developer with over 10 years of experience. She has taught thousands of students and loves making complex topics easy to understand.
courses.description: Another excellent beginner Illustrator course with a slightly different teaching style focused on creative projects.
courses.whatLearn: Create beautiful vector graphics · Design icons and patterns · Master essential tools quickly
courses.curriculumDescription: 7 focused sections with creative projects that help you build a portfolio from day one.
courses.reviewsDescription: Students love the creative approach and quick results. Many created portfolio pieces they're proud of.

courses.title: It Statistics Data Science And Business Analysis
courses.instructorDescription: Morgan Freeman has run a successful SEO agency for 15 years. He now teaches others how to start their own profitable SEO business from home.
courses.description: Learn practical data analysis and statistics for business decisions. No heavy math required.
courses.whatLearn: Analyze business data · Use Excel & Python basics · Make data-driven decisions
courses.curriculumDescription: 8 modules combining theory with real business examples and hands-on exercises.
courses.reviewsDescription: Business professionals appreciate the practical focus. Many improved their work performance immediately.

courses.title: Starting SEO As Your Home Based Business
courses.instructorDescription: Charles Thompson is a professional graphic designer and Adobe expert. He has worked with big brands and enjoys teaching beginners how to create beautiful designs.
courses.description: Advanced SEO strategies for building a sustainable home business with recurring clients.
courses.whatLearn: Advanced ranking techniques · Client retention · Scale your SEO services
courses.curriculumDescription: 10 in-depth modules with case studies and proven strategies that work today.
courses.reviewsDescription: Students who followed the steps report consistent monthly income from SEO services.

courses.title: Advanced JavaScript Programming Course
courses.instructorDescription: Savannah Nguyen is a passionate full-stack developer with over 10 years of experience. She has taught thousands of students and loves making complex topics easy to understand.
courses.description: Take your JavaScript skills to the next level with modern features and best practices.
courses.whatLearn: ES6+ features · Asynchronous programming · Advanced patterns · Performance optimization
courses.curriculumDescription: 12 challenging sections with complex projects that mirror real-world development.
courses.reviewsDescription: Experienced developers say this course filled their knowledge gaps and improved code quality significantly.

courses.title: UI/UX Design Fundamentals
courses.instructorDescription: Morgan Freeman has run a successful SEO agency for 15 years. He now teaches others how to start their own profitable SEO business from home.
courses.description: Learn the fundamentals of user-centered design and create beautiful, functional interfaces.
courses.whatLearn: Design principles · User research · Wireframing & prototyping · Modern design tools
courses.curriculumDescription: 15 comprehensive modules from research to final designs with real client brief simulations.
courses.reviewsDescription: Beginners feel confident designing professional interfaces after completing this well-structured course.

courses.title: Digital Marketing Masterclass
courses.instructorDescription: Charles Thompson is a professional graphic designer and Adobe expert. He has worked with big brands and enjoys teaching beginners how to create beautiful designs.
courses.description: Complete digital marketing training with proven strategies that get real results.
courses.whatLearn: Full-funnel marketing · All major channels · Campaign optimization · Measuring ROI
courses.curriculumDescription: 20 in-depth modules covering every aspect of modern digital marketing with case studies.
courses.reviewsDescription: Marketing professionals and business owners report significant growth after applying the strategies taught.
